John Arrowwood wrote:

>If only I had my own beowulf cluster!!!  :)
>  
>
Tell me about it. I don't suppose there is any scope for scaling down 
your experiment yet further so you can speed it up? Or perhaps someone 
on the list has access to a cluster... Ken, can't you just sign a 
purchase order at your place and sort it out? :)

Colin.
